IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: MARYLAND UNIVERSITY OF INTEGRATIVE HEALTH (MUIH) OR (UNIVERSITY) IS AN ACCREDITED GRADUATE SCHOOL COMPRISED OF INDIVIDUALS WITH AN ACADEMIC AND CLINICAL FOCUS ON INTEGRATIVE HEALTH, WELLNESS, AND PREVENTION. THE UNIVERSITY IS DISTINGUISHED BY HAVING: MORE THAN 40 YEARS OF LEADERSHIP IN COMPLEMENTARY MEDICINE; ACADEMIC PROGRAMS THAT ARE MARKET DRIVEN, FORWARD THINKING, AND CAREER-ORIENTED; PROGRAMS THAT REFLECT THE SEAMLESS INTEGRATION OF SCIENTIFIC INQUIRY AND WISDOM TRADITIONS; AND A POWERFUL COMBINATION OF RIGOROUS DIDACTIC LEARNING AND HANDS ON EXPERIENTIAL LEARNING.
IRS990.MissionDesc: MUIH IS AN ACCREDITED GRADUATE SCHOOL COMPRISED OF INDIVIDUALS WITH AN ACADEMIC AND CLINICAL FOCUS ON INTEGRATIVE HEALTH, WELLNESS, AND PREVENTION. THE SCHOOL IS DISTINGUISHED BY HAVING: MORE THAN 40 YEARS OF LEADERSHIP IN COMPLEMENTARY MEDICINE; ACADEMIC PROGRAMS THAT ARE MARKET DRIVEN, FORWARD THINKING, AND CAREER-ORIENTED; PROGRAMS THAT REFLECT THE SEAMLESS INTEGRATION OF SCIENTIFIC INQUIRY AND WISDOM TRADITIONS; AND A POWERFUL COMBINATION OF RIGOROUS DIDACTIC LEARNING AND HANDS ON EXPERIENTIAL LEARNING.
IRS990.Desc: DEGREE PROGRAMS: THE SCHOOL'S MASTER'S DEGREE PROGRAMS INCLUDE ACUPUNCTURE, ORIENTAL MEDICINE, NUTRITION AND INTEGRATIVE HEALTH, THERAPEUTIC HERBALISM, HEALTH AND WELLNESS COACHING, AND HEALTH PROMOTION. THE SCHOOL'S POST-BACCALAUREATE CERTIFICATE PROGRAMS AND POST-MASTER'S CERTIFICATE PROGRAMS INCLUDE HEALTH AND WELLNESS COACHING, HERBAL STUDIES, MEDICAL HERBALISM, CHINESE HERBS AND NUTRITION AND INTEGRATIVE HEALTH.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: STUDENT SERVICES: MUIH PROVIDES A VARIETY OF ANCILLARY SERVICES TO STUDENTS. THE OFFICE OF FINANCIAL AID PROVIDES INFORMATION ON SCHOLARSHIPS AND THE FEDERAL FAMILY EDUCATIONAL LOAN PROGRAM. THE MEETING POINT BOOKSTORE STOCKS TEXTBOOKS AND SPECIALTY BOOKS AND INCLUDES A CAFE. THE LIBRARY HOUSES A COLLECTION OF OVER 10,000 BOOKS, VIDEOTAPES, AUDIOTAPES AND JOURNALS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: CLINICAL SERVICES: MUIH'S CLINICAL SERVICES DELIVER HEALTH AND WELLNESS CONSULTATIONS. CLINICAL SERVICES PROVIDED INCLUDE ACUPUNCTURE TREATMENTS, CONSULTATIONS WITH AN HERBALIST, CONSULTATIONS WITH A NUTRITIONIST, CONSULTATIONS WITH A HEALTH COACH, AND CONSULTATIONS WITH A YOGA THERAPIST.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: COMMUNITY EDUCATION: COMMUNITY EDUCATION AND CONTINUING EDUCATION PROGRAMS ARE PROVIDED TO THE GENERAL PUBLIC AND ALUMNI.

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.PersonNm: BONNIE J KRAMER MS MAC LAC

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.TitleTxt: VP, CHIEF VALUES OFFICER & INST DEV THRU 12/31/17

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE INCOME TAX POSITIONS TAKEN BY MUIH FOR ANY YEARS OPEN UNDER THE VARIOUS STATUTES OF LIMITATIONS ARE THAT MUIH CONTINUES TO BE EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAXES AND THAT IT HAS PROPERLY REPORTED UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME THAT IS SUBJECT TO INCOME TAXES. MUIH BELIEVES THAT THERE ARE NO TAX POSITIONS TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN THAT WOULD SIGNIFICANTLY INCREASE UNRECOGNIZED TAX LIABILITIES WITHIN 12 MONTHS OF THE REPORTING DATE. NONE OF MUIH'S FEDERAL OR STATE INCOME TAX RETURNS ARE CURRENTLY UNDER EXAMINATION.
MUIH INCLUDES STATEMENTS REGARDING ITS RACIALLY NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY IN ITS ACADEMIC ADMISSION MATERIALS.
MUIH RECEIVES STUDENT FINANCIAL AID AND FEDERAL DIRECT GRADUATE PLUS LOANS WHICH PROVIDE LOANS TO STUDENTS FOR TUITION AND LIVING EXPENSES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY THE FINANCE AND AUDIT COMMITTEE. THE FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: OFFICERS AND TRUSTEES ARE PROVIDED A COPY OF THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY. ANNUALLY, OFFICERS AND DIRECTORS ARE REQUIRED TO COMPLETE A QUESTIONNAIRE RELATED TO COMPLIANCE WITH THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPENSATION OF THE TOP MANAGEMENT OFFICIAL AND OFFICERS ARE BASED ON INFORMATION THAT INCLUDES A REVIEW OF COMPENSATION AT OTHER HIGHER EDUCATION SCHOOLS AS PERFORMED BY AN INDEPENDENT COMPENSATION CONSULTANT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE UNIVERSITY MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
GAIN ON FORGIVENESS OF DEBT 71,957. LOSS ON UNAMORTIZED LOAN FEES -326,146.
